attributes.action: stop ignoring all the popular petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I can not think of a single petition that has been implemented.
This petition is hereby instigated to ensure that the government stops paying lip servive, and starts paying attention.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
